<<<<<<< HEAD
An antidote against lust: or, A discourse of uncleanness, shewing its various kinds, great evil, the temptations to it, and most effectual cure. By Robert Carr, minister of the Church of England Carr, Robert, fl. 1686-1696.
[10], 182 p.
printed by J. Astwood for John Dunton, at the Raven in the Poultrey, London : 1690.
The words 'its various kinds,... most effectual cure.' on title page, are gathered by a left brace. Running title reads: A discourse of uncleanness. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
